aboutUs.title: About Me
aboutUs.paragraph1: I am Pablo, Argentine, born on August 12, 1988 in the city of Buenos Aires. Currently, I reside in Brazil, in Balneário Camboriú, state of Santa Catarina, where I moved to in early 2022.
aboutUs.paragraph2: As a Front-End Dev, I am passionate about both personal and professional growth in the world of technology. I define myself as responsible, self-taught, proactive, resourceful, and restless. I enjoy working in teams to accelerate and share the learning process.
aboutUs.paragraph3: Working as a freelance professional in the field of web development since 2019, I have experience with basic technologies such as JavaScript, Bootstrap, jQuery, CSS3, and HTML5. My focus is on creating efficient and attractive web solutions for my clients.
aboutUs.paragraph4: I employ advanced technologies such as Angular and React JS, along with Firebase for database storage. I also use project management and version control tools, with GitHub being an integral part of my workflow.
aboutUs.paragraph5: In addition to development, I have experience with content management systems (CMS) such as Webflow and Wordpress, allowing me to offer complete and adaptable solutions to specific content and administration needs.
aboutUs.paragraph6: Furthermore, I am familiar with digital marketing tools, including Meta Ads, Google Ads, Google Tag Manager, and Google Analytics, enabling me to integrate effective marketing strategies into my web projects.
